snippet: The execution of a group of prisoners, apparently soldiers or militiamen, appears to be evidence of a war crime by the rebels, human rights activists said.
abstract: Human rights activists say video circulating on the Internet that depicts Syrian rebel fighters abusing and executing group of prisoners is evidence of war crime and indication that both sides in Syrian conflict are increasingly committing atrocities.
lead_paragraph: The execution of a group of prisoners, apparently soldiers or militiamen, appears to be evidence of a war crime by the rebels, human rights activists said.

headline.seo: Video Said to Show Executions by Syrian Rebels
headline.main: Video Is Said to Show Syrian Rebels Executing Prisoners
headline.print_headline: Rebels Accused Of a War Crime

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
